pageSetting.title: 不良贷款清收奖励管理导入

column.name: qsfs
column.annotate: 请输入代号： 1 现金清收 2 呆账核销 3 票据置换 4 以物抵债

column.name: bllx
column.annotate: 请输入代号： 1- 表内 2- 表外

column.name: wjfl
column.annotate: 请输入代号 3-次级 4-可疑 5-损失

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'贷款账号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zhdh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'贷款账号输入错误，长度不能超过:40!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zhdh)>40 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'账户名称输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zhhm)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'账户名称输入错误，长度不能超过:100!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zhhm)>100 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'清收方式输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.qsfs)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'清收方式不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from csb_dmms ms where lower(ms.dmmc)=lower('QSFS') and rtrim(t.qsfs)=rtrim(ms.dmz)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'不良类型输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.bllx)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'不良类型不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from csb_dmms ms where lower(ms.dmmc)=lower('BLLX') and rtrim(t.bllx)=rtrim(ms.dmz)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'清收人输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.hydh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'清收人不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from khdx_hy h where rtrim(t.hydh)=rtrim(h.hydh)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'清收日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.qsrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'清收日期输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.qsrq)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'发放日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.ffrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'发放日期输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.ffrq)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'五级分类输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.wjfl)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'五级分类不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from csb_dmms ms where lower(ms.dmmc)=lower('BLWJFL') and rtrim(t.wjfl)=rtrim(ms.dmz)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'逾期日期输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.yqrq)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'收回本金输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.shbj)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'本金计提比例输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.bjjtbl)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'收回利息输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.shlx)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'利息计提比列输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.lxjtbl)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计提工资输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jtgz)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.jtgz,21,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计提工资输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jtgz)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'备注说明输入错误，长度不能超过:100!' where f_java_rule_length(t.bzsm)>100 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'贷款期限输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.dkqx)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp set error=error||'逾期日期填写错误！正确格式为“yyyyMMdd”' where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and error='error' and (length(yqrq)!=8 or F_JAVA_RULE_DATE(rtrim(yqrq),'yyyyMMdd')=1) and length(yqrq)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp set error=error||'收回本金填写错误,必须为数字!' where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and F_JAVA_RULE_NUMBER(rtrim(shbj),21,2)=1 and length(shbj) > 0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp set error=error||'本金计提比例填写错误,必须为数字!' where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and F_JAVA_RULE_NUMBER(rtrim(bjjtbl),14,2)=1 and length(bjjtbl) > 0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp set error=error||'收回利息填写错误,必须为数字!' where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and F_JAVA_RULE_NUMBER(rtrim(shlx),21,2)=1 and length(shlx) > 0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp set error=error||'利息计提比列填写错误,必须为数字！' where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and F_JAVA_RULE_NUMBER(rtrim(lxjtbl),14,2)=1 and length(lxjtbl) > 0

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set error = error || '此贷款期限不存在' where not exists (select 1 from CSB_QXSDB where JXDXLX = 2 and t.dkqx between qsqx and jsqx) and t.khdxdh = 1 and length(t.dkqx) > 0

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from SGLR_BLDKQSMX tar ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.qsrq as INTEGER)=tar.QSRQ and t.zhdh =tar.ZHDH and t.hydh=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update bldkqsjlgldr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select zhdh,hydh from bldkqsjlgldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by zhdh,hydh having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.zhdh=dr.zhdh and t.hydh=dr.hydh) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE bldkqsjlgldr_temp ( zhdh varchar(100) , zhhm varchar(100) , dkqx varchar(100) , qsfs varchar(100) , bllx varchar(100) , hydh varchar(100) , qsrq varchar(100) , ffrq varchar(100) , wjfl varchar(100) , yqrq varchar(100) , shbj varchar(100) , bjjtbl varchar(100) , shlx varchar(100) , lxjtbl varchar(100) , jtgz varchar(100) , bzsm varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from bldkqsjlgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from bldkqsjlgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, zhdh,zhhm,dkqx,qsfs,bllx,hydh,qsrq,ffrq,wjfl,yqrq,shbj,bjjtbl,shlx,lxjtbl,jtgz,bzsm,khdxdh,error from bldkqsjlgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, zhdh,zhhm,dkqx,qsfs,bllx,hydh,qsrq,ffrq,wjfl,yqrq,shbj,bjjtbl,shlx,lxjtbl,jtgz,bzsm,khdxdh,error from bldkqsjlgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, zhdh,zhhm,dkqx,qsfs,bllx,hydh,qsrq,ffrq,wjfl,yqrq,shbj,bjjtbl,shlx,lxjtbl,jtgz,bzsm,khdxdh,error from bldkqsjlgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGLR_BLDKQSMX(QSRQ,ZHDH,KHDXDH,ZHHM,DKQX,QSFS,WJFL,SHBJ,SHLX,BLLX,YQRQ,BJJTBL,LXJTBL,JTGZ,BZSM,CZR,CZSJ) select cast (t.qsrq as INTEGER), t.zhdh ,KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH, t.zhhm , t.dkqx , t.qsfs , t.wjfl ,cast (t.shbj as DECIMAL(25,4)),cast (t.shlx as DECIMAL(25,4)), t.bllx ,cast (t.yqrq as INTEGER),cast (t.bjjtbl as DECIMAL(19,5)),cast (t.lxjtbl as DECIMAL(19,5)),cast (t.jtgz as DECIMAL(25,4)), t.bzsm ,$login_khdxdh$,F_GET_SYSTIME() from bldkqsjlgldr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and KHDX_HY0.HYDH=cast (t.hydh as VARCHAR(20))
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGLR_BLDKQSMX tar where exists(select 1 from bldkqsjlgldr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.qsrq as INTEGER)=tar.QSRQ and t.zhdh=tar.ZHDH and t.hydh=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
